action.guidanceTemplate: Skip exfoliating acids today. They increase sun sensitivity with extreme UV levels.

action.guidanceTemplate: Windy conditions strip moisture. Apply a barrier cream or balm to protect your skin.
Wind can irritate skin. Skip harsh peels and strong retinoids today.

action.guidanceTemplate: Cold weather requires richer protection. Use a heavier moisturizer with ceramides or squalane.
Hot weather calls for lighter products. Use oil-free, mattifying formulations.
Hot weather increases sun exposure. Use a mattifying sunscreen and reapply frequently.
Snow reflects UV rays, doubling exposure. Treat this as a high UV day and use SPF 50+.
